price: But when He did give them out of His bounty, they grew stingy and turned away in aversion.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
